msbt.message: 'Sup? Y'ever take a look at the sky?
Nope.
All the time!
Uh...why would I?

Never?! Wow, are you missing out.I mean, I don't stare at it all day or nothin'. But once in a while, it helps to put stuff in perspective.When I'm feelin' stressed, it's good to stop, look up, and watch the sky for a while, .

Grease yeah! I'm pretty into sky watchin' myself.Whenever I feel the ol' blood start to boil, I chill out and watch the sky for a while to simmer down.It helps put me in the right mood to go apologize for whatever got me so heated to begin with, .
You oughta try it, ! Sure, folks'll look at you funny, but who cares what they think?Maybe there's a pretty sunset or some wild-lookin' clouds up there. You never know till you check!
Sometimes it's tough to know how you're really feelin'. Try this. Take a deep breath and look inside yourself.Now, still inside yourself, look up. What's the weather like?
Sunny skies.
Dark clouds.
Look out!
Nice! No wonder you always look so happy, . Can't argue with sunny skies, right?

Oh? Is everything alright? Hey, it's cool. We all have tough times.Ridin' out the storm till things get better can take a lot of patience. But remember, it's just a matter of time.Till then, just try to find small ways to take care of yourself, alright? You got this, !
Yeah, I'm not gonna fall for that, . Nice try, though.
Y'know how most folks like coffee a particular way? Well, me, I see folks order and wanna try it THEIR way.So how 'bout it? What kinda coffee gets your morning goin'?
Black for me.
Plenty of cream.
Gimme sugar!
Bwahaha! Yeah, that's a kick that'll get you outta bed. Some folks can't get used to the bitternessBut that's the point of coffee! Your first sip should make you wanna hit back, !
So you like it to go down smooth, ? Yeah, that's me some days too.When you wake up in a lousy mood, the last thing you need is your coffee rubbin' salt in the wound.
Caffeine AND sugar?! Guess that's the choice for folks who wanna stay wired all day, .It ain't a bad idea though, if you know you got a long day ahead of you. Helps to go in swingin'!
OK, so you've got this garden, right? You decide to grow flowers in it, but what kinda flowers are they?Don't think too hard about it. Just go with your gut, !
Cute flowers!
Elegant flowers!
Rare flowers!

Cute flowers, eh? Cool! I bet that says a lot about you, and the kind of buddies you hang with.If you're growin' cute flowersthat means your friends are gentle and shy, and you gotta look after 'em.Maybe it's like that 'cause your pals think you're a rock they can lean on, !

Pretty flowers, eh? Cool! I bet that says a lot about you, and the kind of buddies you hang with.A garden full of elegant flowers means you hang out with stylish, complex, and artistic types.Kind of another way of sayin' you've got fancy tastes, !

Well, well, well! Rare flowers, eh? I bet that says a lot about you, and the kind of buddies you hang with.With rare flowers, you probably have lots of pals who march to their own drummer, y'know what I mean?And nobody has friends like that without bein' at least a little open- minded, so props to you!
'Supwith you? Whoof. Sorry 'bout that. I slept fine, but it FEELS like I pulled an all-nighter, .I gotta figure out some way of gettin' my motor revved. Any ideas?
Move your body!
Try a cold shower?
Just go back to sleep.

Exercise, huh? There's an idea. Didn't expect that from you, but it's not bad.Never been a huge fan of that stuff myself, but I gotta admitâ€”it gets the blood pumpin', .Sure, I'll give it a shottomorrow.

Yikes! That's a bold play. What's next, you gonna tell me to eat a hot pepper for breakfast?Actually, that might work! And I do like hot peppers Yeah! That could be just the ticket, !Good idea, . I'll be sure to remember you suggested something that suggested peppers!

For real, ? When you're not feelin' it, you just hit the snooze button on life? Wow.But I guess there's somethin' to be said for getting some real rest and not staggerin' around like a zombie.In fact, you know what? You're right! I'm goin' back to sleep right now!<10_4 /> Nah, not reallyI got stuff to do.
How've you been? Had any good meals lately, ?
Every day!
Once in a while.
Come to think of it...

Rock on! So many folks just eat 'cause they gotta and don't take the time to make somethin' good.When you know you've got somethin' to look forward to for dinner, it helps the whole day go by faster.And listen, if you like good food, you gotta try my cooking sometime. I'll serve up a meal you'll never forget!

Good to hear it. If you forget what it's like to enjoy food, pretty soon your whole life seems stale.A nice meal gets me fired up! It's like, "Oh yeah, THIS is what it's all about!" Then I can take on the world!It'd be cool if I could feel like that all the timebut if you treat yourself every day, it stops feelin' special.

Yothat's not good.Look, it ain't complicated. If you're not feedin' your mouth, you're not feedin' your spirit.If you don't wanna cook, come by my place sometime and I'll cook for you. It's for your own good, !
